__e: "Dearest mother, "I'm sorry it has been so long since my last letter.
I do apologize for my men's treatment of you.
I apologize for the distastefulness of it all, but we should get going.
Hey, I'm sorry about the way I handled things last night.
Seriously? - Well, I'm sorry for the way I behaved in high school, but that was a long time ago.
I apologize for the way I talked to you at the hospital.
"Dear David, I apologise for all the hurt I must've caused you during the past year by not writing, but the truth is I met someone else and I'm now married."
I don't apologize for it, I like it about myself.
I do not apologize for things I feel good about, and I feel good about this.
This is a mistake and I apologize, but I have to go.
No, really excuse me, just that... its almost difficult to say that... you know, it's not every day that we... every day... moreover, it is once or twice in your life when we can meet someone.
I'm very sorry, but I've been asked to tell you there is a police officer here who wishes to see you.
And then, you know, when I think about it, it was probably my fault in the first place, so I'll just apologize to her.
If the joke that I made the other day I apologize to you but did not know that ...
I apologize to them, and we all go home.
Of course I am sorry if...
I know, and I apologize if we have wasted your time.
Look, lady, I apologize if your kid wasn't good enough to make it but this isn't soccer.
